reference: Barro, Robert J., Unanticipated Money Growth and Unemployment in the United States, American Economic Review, 67 (March 1977), 101-115.
Fair, Ray C., The Use of Expected Future Variables in Macroeconometric Models, mimeo, 1986.

Hamilton, James D., Oil and the Macroeconomy since World War II, Journal of Political Economy, 91 (April 1983), 228-248.
Kydland, Finn E., and Edward C. Prescott, Time to Build and Aggregate Fluctuations, Econometrica 50 (1982), 1345-1370.
Lilien, David M., Sectoral Shifts and Cyclical Unemployment, Journal of Political Economy, 90 (August 1982), 777-793.
Pigou, Arthur C., Industrial Fluctuations, 2nd. ed., London: Macmillan, 1929.
Shiller, Robert J., Ultimate Sources of Aggregate Variability, American Economic Review, forthcoming May 1987.
